text: @realDonaldTrump Yes, the anarchists need to be stopped, but the peaceful protestors need to be addressed also. Roll out a plan for a solution to inequality in the policing ... you enacted a Covid-19 task force, so enact a task force to work on policies and laws for this crisis.
